snippet: The platform for raising capital for creative projects and businesses said that hackers had gained access to some of its customers’ data, but that the breach had been repaired.
abstract: Kickstarter, online platform for raising capital for creative projects and businesses, says hackers gained access to some of its customers’ data, but that breach has been repaired; insists no credit card data was accessed and no evidence exists of unauthorized activity of any kind.
lead_paragraph: The platform for raising capital for creative projects and businesses said that hackers had gained access to some of its customers’ data, but that the breach had been repaired.

headline.main: Kickstarter Acknowledges a Breach of User Data
headline.print_headline: Kickstarter Acknowledges a Breach of User Data
